title: pix_pix2sig~
description: The `pix_pix2sig~` object converts incoming image data, typically from GEM, into audio signals. It outputs separate `signal~` streams for each color channel (red, green, blue, and alpha, or YUV/grey), allowing for various reading modes like 'clear', 'fill', 'line', and 'waterfall' to control how the image data is streamed into audio blocks.
